parameters.description: The version of the API to use
parameters.name: Anytype-Version

parameters.description: The ID of the space to which the type belongs; must be retrieved from ListSpaces endpoint
parameters.name: space_id

parameters.description: The ID of the type to retrieve templates for; must be retrieved from ListTypes endpoint or obtained from response context
parameters.name: type_id

parameters.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: The number of items to return
parameters.name: limit
